title: 820-3332 with strange pictures
message:
Have this 820-3332 logic board. What is happening here? 
have tray`d to replace LVDS connector and resloder the u8900 but still the same. 

(pictures is taken up/down)

Any one with any idea? 

[USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER] [USER="1"]larossmann[/USER] [USER="682"]2informaticos[/USER]

title: 820-3332 with strange pictures
message: Has nothing to do with U8900. Either really a bad GPU or damaged component in the frame buffer circuit. Check if it still is within 4 years of purchase so you can take it to Apple.

title: 820-3332 with strange pictures
message:
The board is to nasty/water damage so i dont think thay will touch it.

will look at the buffer circuit.

title: 820-3332 with strange pictures
message: Oh liquid....Corroded resistor around the VRAM or crap under VRAM or GPU.

title: 820-3332 with strange pictures
message:
Yeah, sorry that I forgot to mention that in the first post.

If it provides  that the GPU is the problem is the card ready for the donor box?

title: 820-3332 with strange pictures
message: It will not be the GPU. Traces/corrosion is the issue, the actual chips will be fine.
